mailSubject: Confirmation of Checklist Update for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
mailBody:
Dear Shubham,

I hope this message finds you well.

I wanted to confirm that the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32) has been successfully updated. The latest version incorporates the supplementary PEP screening data and reflects the current status of all checklist items.

Please note that the finalized checklist has been securely stored in the following JSON file for your reference:

- **File Location:** `kyc_json_store/N/A/checklist_info.json`

If you have any further questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,

Surbhi Nagori  
surbhi.nagori@capgemini.com
